bs-rating-types-page:
Label tor the rating item of the type "article"
{{Identical|Page rating}}
bs-rating-types-pagelike:
Label tor the rating item of the type "articlelike"
{{Identical|Page recommendation}}
bs-rating-yourrating:
Label for the users rating value.
* $1 - The users value. String or number
bs-rating-ratingcount-title:
Title for the rating count.
* $1 - Number of ratings
bs-rating-articlelike-ratingtext:
Short label for the button that sets a recommendation when the user has not voted yet.
* $1 - Count of all recommendations
bs-rating-articlelike-uratingtextservote:
Short label for the button that removes the users recommendation.
* $1 - Count of all recommendations
bs-rating-articlelike-ratingtext-title:
Title for the recommendation text.
* $1 - Number of recommendations
bs-rating-articlelike-uservoted-title: Title for the recommendation tick icon.
bs-rating-special-recommendations-label-: Title of the ExtJS manager for recommendations
bs-rating-specialrating-label-namespace:
Short label for the column that lists namespaces in the ExtJS manager
{{Identical|Namespace}}
bs-rating-specialrating-titleTitle: Short label for the column that lists page titles in the ExtJS manager
bs-rating-specialrating-titleRating: Short label for the column that lists the current rating in the ExtJS manager
bs-rating-specialrating-titleVotes: Short label for the column that lists the number of votes in the ExtJS manager
bs-rating-nsm-label: Label for field in BlueSpiceNamespaceManager used to select namespaces in which rating is enabled. {{Identical|Rating}}
bs-rating-nsm-label-recommendations: Label for field in BlueSpiceNamespaceManager used to select namespaces in which recommendations is enabled. {{Identical|Recommendations}}
bs-rating-star-rating-star-label:
Label for star rating star. Parameters:
* $1 - star number
bs-rating-star-rating-star-selected-anno:
Announcement for star rating star selected
Parameters:
* $1 - star number
